parameters.name: Id
parameters.description: The configuration ID of the protected directory.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the request and response. Valid values:

*   **zh**: Chinese
*   **en**: English

parameters.name: SourceIp
parameters.description: The source IP address of the request.

parameters.name: Uuid
parameters.description:
The UUID of the server.

>  You can call the [DescribeCloudCenterInstances](~~DescribeCloudCenterInstances~~) operation to query the UUID.
